name: Elio
overview:
Elio helps companies, from startups to enterprise level, to optimize the process of recruiting new partners and organizing their channel network.

Elio provides the option to roll-out a unified channel program designed uniquely for a company and its market. Companies with partner programs can enter new markets or increase their existing market share through resellers. Lower the costs and time of partnerships by focusing only on high quality leads.

Create your profile to get exposure for your channel programs and get leads straight to your account.Incentivize your partners using localised marketing programs to improve the customer’s overall experience and achieve their goals.

A company’s profile can also be used to promote its content, white papers, case studies, videos and more, to boost your authority and attract better qualified leads.Increase the views of your resources and use them to capture interest.

Control everything from a single dashboard easy and fast and get every insight necessary to run your channel.
